languages.text: Металлический ящик был безжалостно взломан. С чего бы хозяевам корабля ломать его, когда можно было просто открыть ключом?
The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?
languages.original_text: Металлический ящик был безжалостно взломан. С чего бы хозяевам корабля ломать его, когда можно было просто открыть ключом?

traits.locale_text: The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?
The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?
The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?
The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?
The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?

languages.text: Alguien ha forzado la caja de metal para abrirla. ¿Por qué la romperían los propietarios de la nave pudiendo limitarse a girar la llave?
languages.original_text: The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?

traits.locale_text: Alguien ha forzado la caja de metal para abrirla. ¿Por qué la romperían los propietarios de la nave pudiendo limitarse a girar la llave?

languages.text: 这个金属箱被强行撬开。如果只要简简单单地转动钥匙就能打开它，那谁还会采取暴力手段呢？
languages.original_text: The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?

traits.locale_text: 这个金属箱被强行撬开。如果只要简简单单地转动钥匙就能打开它，那谁还会采取暴力手段呢？

languages.text: 金属の箱は乱暴に開けられている。単純に鍵を開ければいいだけなのに、宇宙船の所有者は何故無理にこじ開けたんだ？
languages.original_text: The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?

traits.locale_text: 金属の箱は乱暴に開けられている。単純に鍵を開ければいいだけなのに、宇宙船の所有者は何故無理にこじ開けたんだ？

languages.text: Die Metallkiste wurde mit Gewalt geöffnet. Warum sollten die Besitzer des Schiffs sie aufbrechen, wenn sie nur den Schlüssel umzudrehen brauchten?
languages.original_text: The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?

traits.locale_text: Die Metallkiste wurde mit Gewalt geöffnet. Warum sollten die Besitzer des Schiffs sie aufbrechen, wenn sie nur den Schlüssel umzudrehen brauchten?

languages.text: Quelqu'un a brutalement forcé cette caisse de métal. Pourquoi le propriétaire du vaisseau aurait-il fait cela au lieu d'utiliser simplement la clé ?
languages.original_text: The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un a brutalement forcé cette caisse de métal. Pourquoi le propriétaire du vaisseau aurait-il fait cela au lieu d'utiliser simplement la clé ?

languages.text: Metal kutu, büyük bir güç kullanılarak açılmış. Geminin sahipleri, anahtarla girmek dururken neden zorla girmeyi tercih etmiş olsunlar ki?
languages.original_text: The metal box was brutally forced open. Why would the ship's owners break into it if they could simply turn the key?

traits.locale_text: Metal kutu, büyük bir güç kullanılarak açılmış. Geminin sahipleri, anahtarla girmek dururken neden zorla girmeyi tercih etmiş olsunlar ki?
